official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to make necessary repairs to the Milton Dam in Mahoning County, Ohio.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to make repairs to the Milton Dam, Mahoning County, Ohio. Authorizes appropriations.
